vote.title:
To authorize the issuance of limited tax general obligation bonds, in one or more series, in an amount not to exceed $135,630,000.00 for the purpose of providing funds to refund certain outstanding general obligation bonds of the City ($135,630,000.00).

Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
vote.description:
Explanation
 
This ordinance authorizes the issuance of limited tax general obligation bonds, in one or more series, in an amount not to exceed $135,630,000 for the purpose of providing funds to refund certain outstanding general obligation bonds of the City ($135,630,000).
 
Title
 
To authorize the issuance of limited tax general obligation bonds, in one or more series, in an amount not to exceed $135,630,000.00 for the purpose of providing funds to refund certain outstanding general obligation bonds of the City ($135,630,000.00).
 
Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
 
Body
 
Please see attached file: City of Columbus - Series 2021 Refunding Bonds - LTGO Bond Ordinance.pdf
